name: Boo! Boo! Graveyard
description:
CREDIT:

Connorses - Coding/Art

Durazorn - Art

CONTROLS:

KEYBOARD PLAYER:
arrows = move
space = place ghost
CONTROLLER:
Left stick = move
A (or bottom button) = place ghost

There's a Web version AND a download for Windows!

This spooky puzzle game is an homage to Chu Chu Rocket, featuring cute ghosts haunting a graveyard! It's got up to 4 player multiplayer for a hectic party game experience. (You can also play singleplayer and go for the high score). :) I know it's difficult to meet people in person in these times, but this should be great for playing with friends via SteamPlay or Parsec.

This game was made for ScreamJam, but it's not very scary. Oh well. XD

Happy Halloween!!
